comment: One of the best professors i've ever had, she really cares about her students. She's very helpful; responds very quickly to emails and gives good feedback. Attendance was not mandatory but recommended, we did in class assignments for a grade. Her class also helped me in my other classes! There is one project and quizzes that were easy and helpful.
Dr. Steiner is one of the best professors at Kennesaw! She cares deeply about her students and truly wants you to succeed! She offers extra credit and responds quickly to emails!

Loved Professor Steiner! Always responded promptly to emails, gave extra credit, and would reach out if you missed points and gave the opportunity for late credit. Def would take her for another class

Dr. Steiner is wonderful. Despite that the content of this class is not my favorite, she makes it very enjoyable. She is willing to listen to any feedback and is so nice. You can tell she cares a lot about her students and provides plenty of accommodations including extra credit and attendance if you are sick. Highly recommend!
Dr. Stenier is a great professor. She understands that not everyone is a psychology fan but makes the class enjoyable. Study from the study guide given and you will do well.
Good class, teacher who cares, lots of opportunities for extra credit. Much smaller than other Psych classes, which is good. Did well in my other Psych classes after hers.

The worst professor I've had, gives students extra credit, but doesn't make the assignment accessible to all students. She decides to play annoying music in class "to wake us up", even though she stated she knows it's obnoxious, she does it anyways. She's doesn't know how to teach psychology correctly; my HS AP Psych teacher could teach better.
rating_tags: TEST HEAVY--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Highly recommend taking her! She makes transitioning to college a lot easier. She highly recommends getting involved with the school. She has you do a happiness booster at the end of each class which makes you feel like you are back in elementary school, but its fun. Just know your due dates and do everything offered and you will get an A.

Oh my gosh this woman is incredible. I took her for my Freshman seminar and she was just so kind and understood that the transition to college is a big deal. You have LOTS of projects that are kinda just busy work, but you can learn a lot about KSU if you pay attention. Two tests, midterm and final. Super easy. She is WONDERFUL! Take her!
TAKE HER! She is so caring and she wants all her students to do well. Such an easy A. Attendance counts as a part of your grade so just go to class and you will get an A.
She's a wonderful professor and cares so much about her students. Seminar with her is probably the easiest class i've ever taken.

SHE IS WONDERFUL! Amazing woman who truly cares. I took her as a freshman and she made the transition so easy. Lots of projects and busy work, but it's not hard at all, and the projects actually teach you stuff. If you want the perfect professor take Steiner.

Wonderful woman who will always try to help you out, but she does not just give away grades. You will still have to deliver quality work and attending class is basically a grade but it is an alright class compared to what I've heard about other freshman seminar instructors.

She was an absolutely amazing teacher. I took her for a learning community, and though i was very hesitant about taking a psych class during my first semester back at school after 10 years out of school, she was absolutely amazing. If you have an opportunity to take her DO IT. She is not one of the highest rated on here for no reason!!

Professor Steiner was definitely my favorite professor to date. Her class is tough, but she makes it bearable. She gives great lectures. Lots of group work. A lot of homework, but generally it's easy and just for participation. The tests are the hardest part, a lot of material and you really have to read the book to pass. Tough class but great prof

Dr. Steiner is one of the kindest teachers ever. Her class was very easy, mostly reflective and informal essays that were only a page long. She wants to help you succeed and is always there to talk. Her midterm and final were both reflective with a little multiple choice from powerpoint. This was the easiest class and most helpful for college.
Dr. Steiner is the kindest professor I have ever had. She is very passionate about helping freshman and is extremely intelligent. She is understanding and she genuinely loves her students.

She is by far one of the best professors at KSU. She lets you correct your exams and you can go up 2 letter grades. So nice and her lectures are really interactive and fun! Made an A and didn't read the book.

TAKE HER FOR PSYCHOLOGY!!! She is awesome! She lets you correct tests for extra credit, and also gives a lot of extra credit opportunities throughout the class. A lot of reading, but if you want an A, take her!

She is very sweet and frequently has little interactive activities in class. Aside from that, all lessons are powerpoints. The class, overall, is easy, but she gave you interesting things to think about.
She is very friendly and easy, you can talk to her about anything, even non-class related topics. She is very passionate in her research about helping freshman. Very nice!! Highly recommend!!!

Dr. Steiner is the best college professor! She is very easy to understand and makes the class interactive! I took her fall semester, first class of my college career and she definitely teaches how be successful. Easy work, easy topics... if you want a easy A, take her!!!!!!!!!!

Dr. Steiner is a great teacher! She is extremely nice and will do all she can to help you with anything. She allows you to make corrections to your tests for some extra credit because it is not an easy class. This was a very interesting class and Dr. Steiner made it fun.I would definately take a class with her again if I could!

One of the best teachers at KSU. I took this class as a learning community and this is one of the best classes I ever took. She is lenient on assignments and explains the content well. Highly recommend
Dr. Steiner is nothing but quality.  She's not a pushover with gradees, but she will go the extra mile to help you out.  One of the best I've had.
She is really passionate about what she's teaching and really cares about her students. She gives extra credit after every test. Class was very fun. I highly recommend taking her if you can.
So sweet and helpful. She really wants the best for her students. She gives notes over a power point and lecture. Her tests are medium hardness. Would so recommend.
For such a pointless job she does a great job at making it worth your while. Plus, she's pretty awesome! If you have to take a freshman seminar aim your sights on Dr. Steiner!
VERY VERY VERY wonderful teacher!
Great teacher and really cares that youre taking something from the class... fantastic.
